SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Distribution relative to AgriFlow Solutions?
SRP.A: Verdant Distribution is {below} AgriFlow Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {TerraTrade Network}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AgriFlow Solutions}.

VE.A: AgriFlow Solutions's food waste in 1977 is {9597.81} tons.

VE.Q: What are the food waste of AgriFlow Solutions, TerraTrade Network, and Verdant Distribution in 1984?

SC.Q: What is the average total Food Waste?

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1979 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1979 was {lower} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1985, was the average total Food Waste higher or lower than between 1976 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total food waste between 1977 and 1985 was {lower} than between 1976 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1980, was the average total Food Waste higher or lower than between 1976 and 1977?
NC.A: The average total food waste between 1978 and 1980 was {lower} than between 1976 and 1977.

NC.A: The total food waste in 1976 was {higher} than in 1980.

MSR.A: {TerraTrade Network} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {AgriFlow Solutions, AgroChain Management, Verdant Distribution, TerraTrade Network}.
